text: Middletown is a city in Orange County, New York, United States. It lies in New York's Hudson Valley region. As of the 2020 United States Census, the city's population was 30,345. The zip code is 10940. Middletown falls within the Kiryas Joel-Poughkeepsie-Newburgh Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==References== Category:Cities in New York (state)
title: Middletown, Orange County, New York
